CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
AttackNear
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local transformComponent = self.Entity.TransformComponent
if isvalid(transformComponent) then local worldPosition = transformComponent.WorldPosition local scaleX = math.abs(transformComponent.Scale.x) local scaleY = math.abs(transformComponent.Scale.y) self._T.shape.Size = Vector2(self._T.spriteSize.x * scaleX + 0.3, self._T.spriteSize.y * scaleY + 0.8) self._T.shape.Position = Vector2(worldPosition.x + self._T.positionOffset.x * scaleX, worldPosition.y + self._T.positionOffset.y * scaleY) end
self:AttackFast(self._T.shape, nil)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: IsAttackTarget
CodeBlockMethod.Code: --if (점령가능상태) then return true end if (defender.Common.is_neutral and defender.Common.is_build) then return true elseif(defender.Common.is_neutral and defender.Common.is_monster)then return false elseif (defender.Common.is_left == self.Entity.Common.is_left) then return false elseif (defender.Common.is_left ~= self.Entity.Common.is_left) then return true end return __base:IsAttackTarget(defender, attackInfo)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: CalcDamage
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(defender.Common.is_build) then return self.atk*0.7 elseif(defender.Common.is_player) then return self.atk*1.3 else return self.atk end
